long_description: The Arc'teryx Theta AR jacket shelters you from the storm with Gore-Tex(R) Pro Shell waterproof fabric, clean style and multisport versatility to keep you comfortable on wet and windy adventures. The longest length jacket from Arc'teryx, the Theta AR offers maximum coverage; one-hand adjustable Drop Hood(TM) with tall collar provides quick access to head protection. Supple and breathable Gore-Tex 3L Pro Shell fabric is completely waterproof and windproof. Polyester tricot lining slides easily over mid layers. Fewer seams mean lighter weight; thin (flat seams) reduce chafing and abrasion. Watertight front zipper with inner laminated windflap ensures total weatherproofing; laminated quick-dry chin guard protects skin. Features watertight laminated polyurethane exposed pit zippers. Storage options include handwarmer pockets and sleeve pocket with laminated zippers. Articulated elbows and no-lift, gusseted underarms ensure a comfortable fit. Dropped rear hem offers full seat coverage and includes adjustable waist and hem drawcords; die-cut, laminated rip-and-stick wrist closures. Athletic fit with slim construction is engineered for performance.
